S02ekmuhr_u:0_1: ñ1.1 evaṃ mayā śru[tam eka{smin}?] samaye bhagavāṃ cchrāvastyāṃ viharati sma,
S02ekmuhr_u:0_3: ñ1.2 atha khalv āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisa[ttvo] mahāsattvo 'nekavidyādharakoṭīniyutaśatasaha[sreṇa] parivṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasamakrāmad
S02ekmuhr_u:0_4: ñ1.3 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā\var{#kṛtvā\lem \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:0_6: ñ1.4 idaṃ mama bhagavann ekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayam ekādaśabhi[x] [kalpako]ṭībhir bhāṣitam /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_8: cet tarhi \Dutt} bhāṣiṣyāmi sarva[sattvānā]m arthāya hitāya sukhāya sarvavyādhipraśa[ma]nāya{ḥ} sarvapāpālakṣmīduḥsvapnapratinivāraṇāya sarvākālamṛtyupratinivāraṇāya aprasādānāṃ prasādanāya sarvavighnavināyakānāṃ praśamanāya /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_9: ñ1.6 nā[haṃ] bhagava(n/t) samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyā[ḥ] prajāyā,
S02ekmuhr_u:0_10: yad anena hṛdayena rakṣe kṛte paritre parigra[he śā]ntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare śastraparihare viṣadūṣaṇe\var{viṣa[dūṣa]ṇe \em \Hidas;
S02ekmuhr_u:0_11: viṣa[prahā]ṇe \em\Dutt} kṛte yaḥ kaś cid atikrame[n] na praśame[n],
S02ekmuhr_u:0_12: nedaṃ [sthā]na[ṃ] vidyate; sthāpya paurāṇāṃ karma vipacyat[e] tad asya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_15: ñ1.9 smarāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃ gaṅgānadībālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍā\var{#cūḍā#\lem \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:0_21: udgṛhītaṃ ca \Dutt} / saha pratilaṃbhe[na] daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatā[ḥ] sumukhībhūtā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhāḥ /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_22: ñ1.11 evaṃ bahukaro 'yaṃ mā\ill*hṛdayaṃ tasmāt tarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ sādhayitavya{ṇa}m /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_24: ñ1.12 kālyam\var{kālyam\lem \cod; kalyam \Dutt} utthāya aṣṭo[t]taraṃ vāraśataṃ pravartayitavyam /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_25: ñ1.13 dṛṣṭadharmikā guṇā daśa parigrahīyāḥ\var{parigrahīyāḥ\lem \cod; parigrahītavyāḥ\Dutt \em} /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_34: ñ1.20 [6] na viṣaṃ na garam na jvaraṃ na śastram kāye kramiṣyati /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_38: kālaṃ ca \Dutt} kariṣyati / %NB number 10 seems to be missing,
S02ekmuhr_u:0_39: or a different counting is required
S02ekmuhr_u:0_44: ñ1.28 [4] itaś c[y]utaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyate
S02ekmuhr_u:1_0: smarāmy ahaṃ bhagavann it daśānāṃ gaṅgānadībāl[u]kāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato 'bhūt{a} /
S02ekmuhr_u:1_3: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sarvabuddhānāṃ\var{sarvabuddhānāṃ\conj \Nagashima;
S02ekmuhr_u:1_5: yena\var{ye\lem \Dutt; yena \cod} bandhanabaddhā ye vadhyaprāptā\var{ye\rarr badhyaprāptā repeated \dittography \cod} ye udakāgnivividhaduḥkhābhyāhatā[ḥ] tad anenāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ trāṇam śaraṇam parāyaṇaṃ bhavāmi yat\var{yat\lem \Dutt;
S02ekmuhr_u:1_10: mahārdhiko \Dutt} 'yaṃ mama bhagavat hṛ[dayam] ekavelāṃ prakāśitvā catvāro mūlāpattayaḥ kṣa[yaṃ] gacchanti\var{gacchanti\lem \Dutt;
S02ekmuhr_u:1_13: % Dutt supplies ``teṣāṃ ye'' but better understand:
S02ekmuhr_u:1_14: ``why say more, these will happen as they are taught''
S02ekmuhr_u:2_2: #mūlaṃ bhaviṣyati \Dutt} ye śroṣyanti prāk- eva japa-sādhana-ādibhiḥ /
S02ekmuhr_u:2_4: ye ca\var{ye ca\lem \em; yaśca \cod} caturdaśīpañcadaśī\com{dual loc.
S02ekmuhr_u:2_8: tena nā[madhe]yam- api grahaṇena bhagavan- saha sas- ayam- buddha-koṭī-niyuta-śata-sahasra-atireka-samam /
S02ekmuhr_u:2_12: teṣām- eva kara-tala-gatā- buddha-bodhis- bhaviṣyati /\marginpar{\Dutt p.39}
S02ekmuhr_u:2_14: sādhu sādhu kula-putra yat te\var{yat te\lem \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:2_21: tatra\var{tatra\lem \cod; tataḥ \Dutt} khalu- āryāvalokiteśvaras- bodhisattvo\var{bodhisattva \Dutt} utthāya- āsanāt- eka-aṃsam- uttara-āsaṅgam- kṛtvā bhagavatas- caraṇayos- praṇipatya{m} idam- hṛdayam- āvartayati sma /
S02ekmuhr_u:3_3: namas-\var{nama\lem \em; namaḥ \cod\Dutt} atīta-anāgata-pratyutpa[nnebhyaḥ]\var{missing in Chinese 1071} sarva-tathāgatebhyas- arhadbhyaḥ samyak-saṃbuddhebhyaḥ /
S02ekmuhr_u:4_1: dhara dhara dhiri dhiri \Dutt from Tib} /
S02ekmuhr_u:4_2: dhuru dhuru / iṭṭe viṭṭe / cale cale / pracale pracale / [kusume]\var{kusume\em supplied from Tib also in Chinese} kusumavare /
S02ekmuhr_u:5_2: tat- yathā ha ha ha ha\var{ha ha ha ha\lem \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:5_3: hā [hā hā] hā \Dutt} / ime tile cile bhile khile svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:5_6: \com{abhyukṣipaṇa-\lem BHS for abhyukṣaṇa- or confused with \dhatu{kṣip-}.
S02ekmuhr_u:6_2: tat- yathā ṭuru ṭuru ha ha ha ha\var{ha ha ha ha\lem \cod; hā hā hā hā \Dutt} svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:7_2: tat- yathā siri siri dhiri dhiri siri dhiri\var{siri siri \lem \em based on Chinese;
S02ekmuhr_u:8_2: tat- yathā sāde sāde / sidi sidi / sudu sudu svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:9_3: yasi \Dutt}ddhasi cari huru icuruḥ suruḥ suru\var{suru\lem \cod;
S02ekmuhr_u:9_6: jñātinaṣṭais \Dutt} agnim- prajvālya dadhi-madhu-ghṛta-abhyaktānām- ahorātra-uṣitena- ekena triṃśatā homa[s-] kāryaḥ /
S02ekmuhr_u:10_2: tat- yathā ili mili pili\var{pili\lem from Chinese; \omitted \Dutt} tili / tili hili svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:10_4: dīpābaddha \Dutt} udakena sarṣapair vā\var{sarṣapair vā\lem \em \Nagashima based on Chinese} bhasmanā vā sapta-jāpena /
S02ekmuhr_u:11_2: tat- yathā piṭi piṭi tiṭi tiṭi /
S02ekmuhr_u:11_3: viṭi\var{viṭi viṭi\lem \cod; siṭi siṭi viṭi viṭi Chinese} viṭi gaccha gaccha bhagavan-\var{bhagavan\lem \em (illegible in photo);
S02ekmuhr_u:11_6: kṣipet \Dutt; the MSS's reading should mean that the sādhaka speaks these words as part of the mantra} /
S02ekmuhr_u:12_0: end of hayagrīvāvidyā folio a different hand adds:
S02ekmuhr_u:13_0: oṃ namo ratnatrāyāyaḥ namaś caṇḍavajrapāṇa{ā}ye mahāśaktasenāpa[ta]ye .
S02ekmuhr_u:13_1: tad yathā ugrāya svāhā // ati ugrāya svāhā // ugrapriyāya svāhā ugrapriyāya svāhā .
